content: Retirement Stocks Discussion Supplementary Retirement Scheme (SRS) OCBC Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Aug 2019How can I check the dividends received from SRS investment under OCBC BCIP?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

T@Takingstock @Level 5. GeniusUpdated on 03 Sep 2019Hey there. The bank will send you statements, though I guess there have been one or two cases I think the mail was lost (read: possibly dumped in the trash by the mailman).Easy solution - sign up for e-statements on the SRS.
This was just available for OCBC since July 2019 I think. Before that, I guess its only pure paper statements.1 comment1
